pdhp327:2: tattha yo duṁmano hoti paresaṁ pānabhojane ।
pdhp327:3: na so divā ca rātto ca samādhim adhigacchati ।।
pdhp328:2: sa ve divā ca rātto ca samādhim adhigacchati ।।
pdhp329:1: aśśo va bhadro kaṣāya puṭṭho ātāpino saviṁgaṇo carāṇo ।
pdhp329:2: śraddhāya sīlena ca vīriyeṇa ca samādhinā dhammavipaśśanāya ca ।
pdhp329:3: te khāntisoracchasamādhisaṁṭhitā śutassa praṁñāya ca sāram ajjhagū ।।
pdhp330:1: yo driṣṭe dhaṁme labhati śraddhāṁ praṁñāṁ anuttarāṁ ।
pdhp330:2: sa ve mahaddhano loke moham aṁñaṁ bahuṁ dhanaṁ ।।
pdhp331:2: yaṁ yaṁ so bhajate deśaṁ tattha tattheva pūjiyo ।।
pdhp332:1: śraddhābitiyaṁ puruṣaṁ carantaṁ na naṁ labheyā aśraddho va cāro ।
pdhp332:2: yaśo ca kittī ca tato nam eti saggaṁ ca gacche śarīraṁ prahāya ।।
pdhp333:1: aśraddho akataṁñū ca saṁdhicchedo ca yo naro ।
pdhp334:1: kiccho buddhāna uppādo kicchā dhammassa deśanā ।
pdhp337:1: yo tu vinīya sāraṁbhaṁ aprasādaṁ ca cetaso ।
pdhp337:2: prasannacitto sumano sa ve nyāyyā subhāṣitaṁ ।।
pdhp339:2: śīlañ ca yassa kallāṇaṁ ayirakāntaṁ praśaṁsiyaṁ ।।
pdhp340:1: saṁghe prasādo yassa asti ujjubhūtañ ca daṁśanaṁ ।
pdhp340:2: adaridro ti tam āhu amoghaṁ tassa jīvitaṁ ।।
pdhp341:1: tassā śraddhañ ca śīlaṁ ca prasādaṁ dhammadaṁśane ।
